import { Button, Grid, GridItem } from '@chakra-ui/react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { changeActiveFilter } from '../redux/todos/todosSlice'; function ContentFooter() { //all items const items = useSelector((state) => state.todos.items) //console.log("items:",items) //kaç yapılmamış kaldı const itemsLeft = items.filter((item) => !item.complated).length; //console.log("itemsLeft:",itemsLeft) //Active filter const activeFilter = useSelector((state) => state.todos.activeFilter) return (
{itemsLeft} item{itemsLeft > 1 && 's'} left
) } export default ContentFooter /*
2 items left

  • all

  • Active

  • Completed

*/
